p: Sheriffs Fees on Warrant for Riot
Serving Warrant on 9 defendants @ $1.00 each 9.00
Per diem of 17 aids (Sheriffs Posse) $4.90
Mileage of Self and Posse 40 miles each and return
18 persons in all 720 miles @ 10 c per mile 72.00
Mileage of 9 prisoners 15 miles each @ 10 c per mile 13.50
Per Diem of Guards at Montesano 141.00
Board of Prisoners and Guards at Montesano 112.50
Mileage of 9 prisoners to Olympia Jail 45 miles each
total mileage of Prisoners 405 miles @ 10 c per mile 40.50
Mileage of self and 3 guards going to and returning
from Olympia 90 miles each 360 @ 10 c per mile 36.00
per diem of 3 guards 3 days each @ $2.00 per day 18.00
Committing 9 prisoners to care of Jailer of Thurston Co 9.00
To six days attendance in Court at Tacoma during trial of
write of Habeas Corpus $3.00 per day 18.00
Mileage there and return 175 miles @10 c per mile 17.50
Return 3 filroo @ 20 c each .60
Second Judicial District, W.T.
TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, vs Gus Beudjus Et Al.
W A R R A N T.
Returned and Filed this 15th day of Nov, A.D. 1887
HM Sutton Clerk.
By Deputy
Videtie BOOK AND JOB PRINT
Bail Fixed by the Court $300 Each
HM Sutton Clerk
